channel.title: Analysis on Somtom's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Analysis on Somtom's Blog

item.title: Oktoberfest Analysis Part II
item.description: Bundesarchiv, B 145 Bild-F011476-0004 / MÃ¼ller, Simon / CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons Introduction Everybody knows the Oktoberfest which takes place in Munich every year. In this blog post series we are going to look into a public availabe dataset and try to gain some insights about the Oktoberfest. In the first part we loaded and described the data. We also analysed the price and consumption of beer and hendl (chicken) over the years.

item.title: Oktoberfest Analysis Part I
item.description: By Bayreuth2009 GFDL; CC BY 3.0, from Wikimedia Commons Introduction Everybody knows the Oktoberfest which takes place in Munich every year. In this blog post series we are going to look into a public available data set and try to gain some insights about the Oktoberfest. In the first part we load and describe the data. Furthermore, we will analyse the price and consumption of beer and hendl (chicken) over the years.
